button.label: Run UAP
button.supertip: Run the UAP optimization solver on the current workbook. Reads affordable units with AMI values and finds optimal band assignments.

button.label: Run MIH
button.supertip: Run the MIH optimization solver on the current workbook. Uses MIH!J21 as the residential SF denominator and applies Option 1/Option 4 rules.

button.label: View Scenarios
button.supertip: View and apply different optimization scenarios from the last solver run.

dropDown.label: Select Rent Roll
dropDown.supertip: Select which rent roll sheet to use for optimization.

button.label: Refresh List
button.supertip: Refresh the list of available rent roll sheets.

button.label: Utilities
button.supertip: Configure utility payment settings (electricity, gas, heat, hot water).

button.label: API Settings
button.supertip: Configure API connection settings and authentication.

button.label: Learning
button.supertip: Configure AI learning (soft preferences only): OFF / SHADOW / ON, compare-baseline, and log folder.

button.label: Open Logs
button.supertip: Open the learning log folder for this program profile (UAP / MIH Option 1 / MIH Option 4).
